original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmin nigrodha ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena dantakārena bhikkhū pavāritā honti—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarena dantakārena bhikkhū pavāritāḥ honti
yesam ayyānam sūcigharena atthaḥ aham sūcigharena ati

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bahū sūcighare viññāpenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bahū sūci ghare viññāpenti

original: Yesaṁ khuddakā sūcigharā te mahante sūcighare viññāpenti.
analyzed: yesam khuddakā sūcigharā te mahante sūcighare viññāpenti

original: Yesaṁ mahantā sūcigharā te khuddake sūcighare viññāpenti.
analyzed: yesam mahantā sūcigharā te khuddake sūcighare viññāpenti

original: Atha kho so dantakāro bhikkhūnaṁ bahū sūcighare karonto na sakkoti aññaṁ vikkāyikaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ kātuṁ, attanāpi na yāpeti, puttadāropissa kilamati.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ dantakāraḥ bhikkhūnam bahū sūci ghare karontaḥ na sakkoti aññam vikkāyikam bhaṇḍam kātu attanā api na yāpeti putta dāropissa kilamati

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpessanti.
analyzed: kathan hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyāḥ na mattam jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpessanti

original: Ayaṁ imesaṁ bahū sūcighare karonto na sakkoti aññaṁ vikkāyikaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ kātuṁ, attanāpi na yāpeti, puttadāropissa kilamatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam imesam bahū sūcighare karontaḥ na sakkoti aññam vikkāyikam bhaṇḍam kātu attanā api na yāpeti putta dāropissa kilamati iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: kathan hi nāma bhikkhū na mattam jānitvā bahū sūci ghare viññāpessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhū na mattam jānitvā bahū sūci ghare viññāpenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma te bhikkhave mogha purisāḥ na mattam jānitvā bahū sūci ghare viññāpessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu aṭṭhimayaṁ vā dantamayaṁ vā visāṇamayaṁ vā sūcigharaṁ kārāpeyya bhedanakaṁ, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu aṭṭhi mayam vā danta mayam vā visāṇa mayam vā sūci gharam kārāpeyya bhedanaka pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
Attanā vippakataṁ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: attanā vippakatam attanā pariyosāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Attanā vippakataṁ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: attanā vippakatam parehi pariyosāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Parehi vippakataṁ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: parehi vippakatam attanā pariyosāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Parehi vippakataṁ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: parehi vippakatam parehi pariyosāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: aññassa atthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Aññena kataṁ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: aññena katam paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
